headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. Use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ and /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ endpoint to get or renew an access token.

parameters.name: creator_id
parameters.description: Open ID of the TikTok creator.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Requested fields. If not set, returns the default fields ( profile_image and display_name ). To retrieve certain fields in the response, you must have specific permissions. You can check the 'Required permission' column for each field in the response schema to determine the permissions needed. To confirm that you have the necessary permission scope, you can check the scope returned by the /tt_user/token_info/get/ endpoint. If the required permission has not been granted to you, follow the steps outlined in Get authorization from creators (New) to enable the TikTok account user to reauthorize your app with the permission. Enum values: profile_image display_name followers_count handle_name bio is_on_vacation vacation_start_date vacation_end_date creator_rate location topics creator_badges audience_countries audience_genders audience_ages audience_locales audience_device audience_usage average_views average_views_benchmark six_seconds_views_rate six_seconds_views_rate_benchmark engagement_rate engagement_rate_benchmark engagements_benchmark completion_rate completion_rate_benchmark followers_growth_rate followers_growth_rate_benchmark average_likes average_shares average_comments sponsored_video

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: profile_image
fields.description: URL of the creator avatar. The expiration information is included in the URL. Normally, a URL expires in two days. Example: https://p16-sign-va.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-avt-0068/75dec21d63500917fb6ec8bc59415156~c5_300x300.jpeg?x-expires=1614099600&x-signature=PmK%2BWs3LzSzRL2tYs%2FZx7EjG3Gk%3D .

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: Name displayed in the creator's profile.

fields.name: followers_count
fields.description: Number of followers of the TikTok creator account.

fields.name: handle_name
fields.description: Handle name of the user.

fields.name: bio
fields.description: The text that is displayed in the bio section of a TikTok creator's profile.

fields.name: is_on_vacation
fields.description: Whether the Creator has set the status to Vacation mode. Enum values: True - Creator has set the status to Vacation mode, and is not currently accepting order invitations. False - Creator is not on Vacation mode, and is currently accepting order invitations.

fields.name: vacation_start_date
fields.description: Vacation start date.

fields.name: vacation_end_date
fields.description: Vacation end date.

fields.name: creator_rate
fields.description: Creator starting rate.

fields.name: rate
fields.description: Amount of the rate.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency for the rate amount.

fields.name: is_negotiable_type
fields.description: Whether the Creatorâ€™s rate is negotiable. Enum values: True : You can negotiate the rate with the Creator, no matter the Creator has a starting rate or not. Note : If the Creator does not have a starting rate, then is_negotiable_type will be True , and the values of rate and currency will be empty. False : The Creator has a starting price, and the price is non-negotiable. Values of Rate and Currency will be returned.

fields.name: location
fields.description: The code of the country or region where the creator is located, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

fields.name: topics
fields.description: The main topics of the creator's most recent 30 videos. To find out the allowed values for this field, refer to the section " List of values for topics " below.

fields.name: creator_badges
fields.description: The current badges of the creator. Enum values: RESPONSIVE : Responsive. Creator responds to brands within 48 hours. EXPERIENCED : Experienced. Creator has completed their first campaign. PROFILE_COMPLETE : Profile completed. Creator has completed their full profile.

fields.name: audience_countries
fields.description: Three countries or regions that have the largest audience size.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country or region name.

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_genders
fields.description: Audience gender information.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Enum values: FEMALE , MALE , NONE .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_ages
fields.description: Audience age distribution.

fields.name: age
fields.description: Age group. Enum values: 18-24 , 25-34 , 35+ .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_locales
fields.description: For US creators, top 3 audience distributed states.

fields.name: locale
fields.description: US state (2-letter code). For details, see List of US state and territory abbreviation .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_device
fields.description: Audience device information.

fields.name: device
fields.description: Enum values: ios , android .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_usage
fields.description: Audience TikTok usage.

fields.name: usage
fields.description: Whether the audience uses TikTok frequently. Enum values: Active (An audience is defined as Active if they have logged into the TikTok app within the last 30 days), Inactive .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: average_views
fields.description: Average views is the number of times that the video is watched divided by the number of videos, averaged across the most recent 30 videos.

fields.name: average_views_benchmark
fields.description: The ranking of the average number of views per video for the creator's most recent 30 videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's videos are among the top 1% of videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of average views.

fields.name: six_seconds_views_rate
fields.description: Six second views rate is the number of video views that last for at least 6 seconds divided by the total video views, averaged across the most recent 30 videos.

fields.name: six_seconds_views_rate_benchmark
fields.description: The ranking of the six second views rate for the creator's most recent 30 videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's videos are among the top 1% of videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of six second views rate.

fields.name: engagement_rate
fields.description: Engagement rate is the number of post engagements (likes, shares, and comments) divided by the total video views, averaged across the most recent 30 videos.

fields.name: engagement_rate_benchmark
fields.description: The ranking of the engagement rate for the creator's most recent 30 videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's videos are among the top 1% of videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of engagement rate.

fields.name: engagements_benchmark
fields.description: The ranking of the average number of engagements for the creator's most recent 30 videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's videos are among the top 1% of videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of engagement count.

fields.name: completion_rate
fields.description: Completion rate is the number of times that a video plays to the end divided by the total video views, averaged across the most recent 30 videos.

fields.name: completion_rate_benchmark
fields.description: The ranking of the video completion rate for the creator's most recent 30 videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's videos are among the top 1% of videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of video completion rate.

fields.name: followers_growth_rate
fields.description: Follower growth rate is the increase rate of follower count when compared against the follower count 30 days ago. Not available for new creators with no data 30 days ago.

fields.name: followers_growth_rate_benchmark
fields.description: The ranking of the follower growth rate, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator is among the top 1% of creators on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of follower growth rate.

fields.name: average_likes
fields.description: The average likes over the most recent 30 videos.

fields.name: average_shares
fields.description: The average shares over the most recent 30 videos.

fields.name: average_comments
fields.description: The average comments over the most recent 30 videos.

fields.name: sponsored_video
fields.description: Information about the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: avg_views_per_video
fields.description: The average number of views per video for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: avg_views_per_video_benchmarking
fields.description: The ranking of the average views for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's Branded Content videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's Branded Content videos are among the top 1% of Branded Content videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of average views.

fields.name: avg_six_seconds_views_per_video
fields.description: The six seconds views rate per video for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: avg_six_seconds_views_per_video_benchmarking
fields.description: The ranking of the six seconds views rate for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's Branded Content videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's Branded Content videos are among the top 1% of Branded Content videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of six seconds views rate.

fields.name: video_completion_rate
fields.description: The video completion rate for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: video_completion_rate_benchmarking
fields.description: The ranking of the video completion rate for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's Branded Content videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's Branded Content videos are among the top 1% of Branded Content videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of video completion rate.

fields.name: recent_videos_shares
fields.description: The average shares for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: recent_videos_comments
fields.description: The average comments on the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: recent_videos_engagements
fields.description: The average engagements for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: recent_videos_engagements_benchmarking
fields.description: The ranking of the average engagements for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's Branded Content videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's Branded Content videos are among the top 1% of Branded Content videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of average engagements.

fields.name: engagement_rate
fields.description: The engagement rate for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.

fields.name: engagement_rate_benchmarking
fields.description: The ranking of the engagement rate for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos, compared to other TTCM creators with a similar number of followers and covering the same topic. If the creator's Branded Content videos cover multiple topics, the highest ranking among all topics will be displayed. For instance, a value of 1.0000 means the creator's Branded Content videos are among the top 1% of Branded Content videos on TTCM for that particular topic in terms of engagement rate.

fields.name: recent_videos_likes
fields.description: The average likes for the creator's most recent 30 Branded Content videos.
